headline: Earnings Estimates Rising for Assurant (AIZ): Will It Gain?
summary: Assurant (AIZ) shares have started gaining and might continue moving higher in the near term, as indicated by solid earnings estimate revisions.

headline: Assurant Expands Partnership with Holman
summary: ATLANTA, August 20, 2025--Assurant, Inc. (NYSE: AIZ), a premier global protection company that safeguards and services connected devices, homes, and automobiles in partnership with the world’s leading brands, today announced an expansion of the company’s partnership with Holman, a global automotive leader and one of the largest privately owned dealership groups in the U.S. with 59 dealerships across nine states.
